ComicInfo.Title: Wilfred Kreel, Seeker of the Strange; Disconnect; Bimbo's Private Fun-House; The Toad on the Hill!!!; The Ter'ble Old Man; Boogie Boogie Horror Yarn; The Doll House; A Gothic Masterpiece; The Agony of Binky Brown; Boo Hoo Boo Hoo Cried the Night Man; Blue True; Ghoul Tit Greed

ComicInfo.Summary:
Wilfred Kreel investigates a haunted mansion
A mind moves beyond the mortal plane.
A fun-house is very disturbing.
When their car breaks down Dean and Naomi have to make for a mysterious house.
Terrible things occur while Wilfred Flance sleeps.
A man enters a doll shopâ€¦
Edmund attempts to create new life from old.
Binky is unreasonably influenced by the movie 'Them'.
A murderer receives his just deserts.
Waldo's execution doesn't go as planned.
Grave robbers come a cropper.
